data.title: Solved: Re: Become an active member!!
data.meta_description: I started working as an account assistant with my current company 5 months ago and which is my first Accounting contract job as a profession, introducing SAP to me at my
data.text:
Hi leon,

it does work, but I do not see you in the list of community attendees.

Maybe you need to clieck on the join button?

I started working as an account assistant with my current company 5 months ago and which is my first Accounting contract job as a profession, introducing SAP to me at my first resume date was so new to me and looked complicated and with 1 to 2 days training of introduction at the office I went through alot of tough times performing my duties with sap through the end of the contract job.

I made alot of wrong posting and double posting which got me into issues with the supervisor and the Financial Controller, and I couldn’t take my time to do researches on sap and learn more because I and my other 3 colleagues had to input all the data starting from January to September form the previous software to the new software which is SAP Business One within 3 months.

Welcome to our community. this sounds like a lot of work and switching from one solution to another is always a difficult endeavour. Typically in SAP application, you always have an in app help feature or you could reach out to https://help.sap.com/docs/ and get tons of info on how to do things. In this community will want to focus on best practises processes within the construction industry. There are other groups, where you may find more info on Finance or associated LOB (Line of Business) application.

Hi EC&O Community.

My name is Bala.V and I represent LTIMindtree, one of the 19 Global Strategic Services Partners (GSSP) of SAP.

https://www.ltimindtree.com/enterprise-solutions/sap/

https://www.ltimindtree.com/enterprise-solutions/sap/engineering-construction-industry/

We are a $4+ Billion, 80000+ people Technology Consulting Firm with over 25 years of SAP experience and servicing 700+ customers worldwide.

https://www.larsentoubro.com/corporate/about-lt-group/

We are part of the $22 Billion Engineering & Construction Conglomerate, Larsen & Toubro Group.

Please reach out to us at bala.v@ltimindtree.com or Rajesh.Inamdar@ltimindtree.com to know more about work in SAP EC&O space. Thank you.

Warm regards,

Bala.V

=============

Balasubramanian V

Vice President – SAP Services

LTIMindtree Limited

10th Floor (North)

6 Bevis Marks, London

EC3A 7BA

email: bala.v@ltimindtree.com

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/balasubramanianv/

mobile: +44 7891 153 314

====================

I lead the SAP Practice across Asia Pacific and Japan for LTIMindtree. We are a born in SAP organisation and specialise in the EC&O Industry. We are development partners with the SAP EC&O Industry Business Unit, and the go to partner for enhancing and extending core SAP with our pre built BTP apps, specifically for this industry. If you would like an overview of these solutions, please let me know.

Hello

I am Principal Consultant in the logistic area, responsible in our customer projects to build working processes accros the classic module boundaries. One of our industrie focus is the engineering and construction sector. Our Customers often have their headquater in Europe, but doing projects all over the world.

I hope to learn in this group from the other members best practice solutions and also be able to share my accumulated knowlede in this industry.

Regards, Rauno
